item.title: How to Exchange Bitcoin to PayPal [2023 Update]
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
How to exchange your bitcoins to PayPal with all the KYC problems that normal Crypto Exchanges make for Bitcoin users, has always been a hassle. The nature of Cryptocurrency is to stay anonymous whenever you want. Plus, those procedures known as Know Your Customer is not always easy to complete when in an emergency. Decentralized […]

The post How to Exchange Bitcoin to PayPal [2023 Update] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
How to exchange your bitcoins to PayPal with all the KYC problems that normal Crypto Exchanges make for Bitcoin users, has always been a hassle. The nature of Cryptocurrency is to stay anonymous whenever you want. Plus, those procedures known as Know Your Customer is not always easy to complete when in an emergency. Decentralized exchanges like CoinCannon on the other hand have made the process of exchanging your crypto assets a much easier process just like the way you can exchange Bitcoin to PayPal on CoinCannon. Actually not just easier but also more efficient as most of the time you get exactly 1$ or even more for every 1$ worth of your bitcoin.

Exchange BTC to PayPal Now!

PayPal is an online banking service that enables you to use a protected internet account to pay for goods and services. Any money earned stays in your PayPal account and can be used with the balance topped up by your allocated cards or bank account when paying for things.

Jump to How to Exchange BTC to PayPal step by step guide

For Bitcoin users, however, this service can make the Bitcoin to Cash process much faster. let’s be realistic, you can’t find many stores out there who accept Bitcoin as a payment method yet. So, it’s better to have the option to use our BTC in a from of money more widely accepted whenever we need them. This is when knowing how to exchange your BTC to PayPal comes handy!
In this article, we will explain how to exchange Bitcoin to PayPal instantly and get the exact market value of your cryptocurrency in your PayPal account.

What is Bitcoin and How does it work?

This might still be a question to many, before reading about how to exchange, one must know where Bitcoins come from. Bitcoin is a digital currency that was developed following the housing market crash in January 2009. This cryptocurrency follows the ideas started out by the pseudonymous and mysterious Satoshi Nakamoto in a whitepaper. The identity of the individual or individuals that developed the software is still a mystery. Unlike government-issued currencies, Bitcoin is operated by a decentralized authority and offers the promise of lower transaction fees than traditional online payment mechanisms.

There are no physical Bitcoins and the coins you see are novelty coins that do not have any real value without the code inscribed on them. Bitcoin is only balances retained on a public ledger that everyone has transparent access to, and is verified by a massive amount of computing power along with all Bitcoin transactions. Bitcoins are not issued or supported as a commodity by any banks or governments, nor are individual bitcoins valuable. Although it is not legal tender, the popularity of Bitcoin charts is high, and hundreds of other virtual currencies collectively referred to as Altcoins have been launched following this cryptocurrency.

Can I exchange Bitcoin to PayPal?

Yes, you can get US Dollar, Pounds or Euros in your PayPal account in exchange for your cryptocurrencies at most of the exchanges. But are all of them as fast as CoinCannon? you’ll know the moment you check the process and rates.

Conducted through trustworthy exchange agents – such as jolixo with 24/7 support and immediate exchange without any waiting period- you can exchange Bitcoins for PayPal or any other currency of your choice. This process means immediate cash with the least commission possible, without having to go through the time-consuming process of crypto exchanges. 

Below, you can read the step by step guide on how to exchange BTC to PayPal through CoinCannon in a very simple procedure.

How to get the best value of my Bitcoins in PayPal?

You just have to type hi.exchange in your address bar. And NO! Although there’s a Sign Up button on this page, you don’t need to sign up for performing any sort of exchange at our website. But if you do, you’ll enjoy the following features:

  • Order log that you can check and track at any moment
  • The privilege of entering a referral program that helps you to gain money by referring your fellow traders to hi.exchange
  • Based on your activities, discounts on future orders
  • News on sales and discounts

Therefore, if you’re willing to carry out your exchange using CoinCannon, just go the Bitcoin to PayPal exchange page and follow the following steps in order:

  1. Select Bitcoin from the box on the left and PayPal on the right
  2. Enter the BTC amount you want to exchange to PayPal and behold the most competitive exchange rates!
  3. Before clicking “Next”, please read the instructions and “PayPal fees guide” carefully
  4.  By clicking “Next” and enter your PayPal details and your email address. Please note that we contact you using the email address you provide therefore it’s important that you enter a valid email address
  5. Once again, press Next, and you are taken to the next level where you are asked to review your order. Please click on Review and Check. Read and agree to the terms and AML policy.
  6. By clicking on “Confirm” you are taken to the 4th and last step where you have to pay your order
  7. Obtain a tracking ID, an address, and an Explorer URL
  8. At this stage we ask you to read the instruction carefully. Please do read them carefully!
  9. Transfer your crypto to the Hi Exchange wallet provided to you
  10. Click on the “Confirm Payment” button, sit back and enjoy the money that soon will be in your PayPal account

There are some points worth mentioning regarding your BTC cash out:

  • You can request for PayPal USD, EUR or GBP from “I Get” section of the first Step. After you typed the BTC amount in the “I Give” section, in a blink of an eye, the automated system calculates how much you’ll receive in your PayPal account for your Bitcoins. The rate is pretty amazing, right? don’t worry we’re not going to go bankrupt.
  • You receive a tracking ID, an address, and Explorer URL. You can follow your order using those information or request support from customer service
  • You should transfer the Bitcoins needs to the wallet specified in the last step
  • Please read the instructions and disclaimer carefully before sending the bitcoins
  • Don’t forget clicking “I’ve Paid” button after you have transferred the BTC to out wallet

Once the transaction gets confirmed on blockchain network, Your Bitcoin to PayPal exchange will be completed easily and automatically without any waiting period by fulfilling the easy steps that we explained.

You can always count on us. In case of any questions and problems, you can contact us via WhatsApp, Telegram, Facebook, Email, Skype, Contact Form, and Live Chat. We get back to you ASAP!

The post How to Exchange Bitcoin to PayPal [2023 Update] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: How to Exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin [Instant]
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
Looking to exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin? CoinCannon offers everything you need! Digital currencies have been a quintessential asset for online payments. On top of that, cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC) are gaining momentum as popular payment methods. In that regard, users will find themselves in the need to exchange their assets into one another. And […]

The post How to Exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin [Instant] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Looking to exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin? CoinCannon offers everything you need! Digital currencies have been a quintessential asset for online payments. On top of that, cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC) are gaining momentum as popular payment methods. In that regard, users will find themselves in the need to exchange their assets into one another. And by doing so, the exchange fees can quickly put a dent in their pockets. Fortunately, you can easily exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin with the lowest fees, full anonymity and 24/7 online support. Want to know how?

Head over to jolixo, select AdvCash and Bitcoin in the exchange box and you’re good to go!

What Do I Need to Exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin?

For this exchange, you will need a verified and active Advanced Cash (AdvCash) account. Make sure that the transaction amount does not exceed your withdrawal limit. To receive Bitcoin (BTC), you will need a reliable and secure crypto wallet. Primarily, we suggest you use Trust Wallet. As for CoinCannon, all you need is an email address. CoinCannon provides a hassle-free KYC process and no sign up to speed up your work flow. Despite that, there are benefits for those who sign up on CoinCannon. For example, you can take advantage of CoinCannon affiliate program and earn money online.

What is Advanced Cash (AdvCash)?

Before we go on to talk about how to convert AdvCash to Bitcoin, let’s take a quick look at what this digital currency is. AdvCash is a currency used for online payments. It is based in Belize which provides immunity from national laws of other countries for it. As an offshore currency, it is also encrypted much like cryptocurrencies and benefits from better anonymity and security. The Advance Cash company provides an account for users that allows for a variety of currencies to operate through it. In many ways, it is a lot like Payeer.

And much like Payeer, AdvCash supports transfers in both fiat and cryptocurrency form. With a virtual wallet, users can transfer funds and make payments with very low commission. What makes it interesting, is that Advance Cash is also compatible with other payment systems such as WebMoney or Perfect Money. With free international transfers, users get to enjoy a wide variety of currencies all in a virtual wallet. Furthermore, there are both physical and virtual bank cards available for quick and cheap international Visa/Mastercard payments.

The company was founded in 2014 as a competitor for PayPal and much like its peers, it has gained notable success in the past few years. As the need for virtual banking grows, online payment processing companies continue to narrow the gap with PayPal. Although, such companies are not as popular as PayPal, they offer a lot more freedom.

Keep in mind that you can also Exchange AdvCash to PayPal.

Why Exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin?

Bitcoin is a digital currency that was developed following the housing market crash in January 2009. This cryptocurrency follows the ideas started out by the pseudonymous and mysterious Satoshi Nakamoto in a whitepaper. The identity of the individual or individuals that developed the software is still a mystery. Unlike government-issued currencies, Bitcoin is operated by a decentralized authority and offers the promise of lower transaction fees than traditional online payment mechanisms.

There are no physical Bitcoins and the coins you see are novelty coins that do not have any real value without the code inscribed on them. Bitcoin is only balances retained on a public ledger that everyone has transparent access to, and is verified by a massive amount of computing power along with all Bitcoin transactions. Bitcoins are not issued or supported as a commodity by any banks or governments, nor are individual bitcoins valuable. Although it is not legal tender, the popularity of Bitcoin charts is high, and hundreds of other virtual currencies collectively referred to as Altcoins have been launched following this cryptocurrency.

CoinCannon Platform

Say goodbye to the hassle of searching for the perfect online exchange. CoinCannon is here to offer you everything you need and more. With a combination of anonymity, unbeatable exchange rates, and reliability, it’s a platform like no other.

At CoinCannon, your privacy is our top priority. We understand the importance of keeping personal information safe, and that’s why we don’t require it from our customers. With no KYC or sign-up required, you can trade confidently and securely.

Looking for the best exchange rates? CoinCannon is right there for you. Our platform uses an automated system to ensure that you always get the best value for your trades. Don’t just take our word for it, visit ranking websites like BestChange and OkChanger and see for yourself.

We believe in being proactive and keeping ahead of any potential problems. That’s why we offer 24/7 customer support. No matter the issue, our team is always here to help. So go ahead, make your trades with peace of mind knowing that CoinCannon has got your back.

How to Exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin?

  1. Enter the homepage first, then select AdvCash USD and Bitcoin from the options in the first step. Enter the amount you want to exchange. Following that, the amount of BTC you will receive will automatically calculate.
  2. Press Exchange and you will go to the next stage where you will enter your AdvCash and Payeer wallet details and email. The phone number is optional.
  3. One more time, click on the “Exchange” button and you will go to the next step where you will review your order.
  4. Complete the captcha and click on exchange to go to the next step where you will obtain a tracking ID. Press the “Pay Order” button to go to the AdvCash gateway and make the payment to our AdvCash account. Having transferred your AdvCash USD to CoinCannon, your order will process very quickly.
  5. By finishing all the steps above, our team will send the Bitcoin to your wallet as soon as possible

Done!

Just like that, you have now converted AdvCash to BTC. In general, WMZ payments are inconsistent in terms of how long they might take. Give it a few minutes and the AdvCash USD will be in your account ASAP. In the meantime, you can follow up on your order using the Track ID provided for you. Simply enter the track id in the required section on homepage to see at which point your order is. Remember not to share your Track ID with anyone else.

The post How to Exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin [Instant] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: How to Exchange Payeer USD to Tether USDT
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
Looking to exchange Payeer USD to Tether USDT? CoinCannon is all you need! Exchanging digital currencies can be a hassle sometimes, especially when you want crypto assets. For the most part, it might be easy to convert assets, but finding an exchanger with no compromise is hard. Fortunately, CoinCannon offers everything online customers need to […]

The post How to Exchange Payeer USD to Tether USDT appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Looking to exchange Payeer USD to Tether USDT? CoinCannon is all you need! Exchanging digital currencies can be a hassle sometimes, especially when you want crypto assets. For the most part, it might be easy to convert assets, but finding an exchanger with no compromise is hard. Fortunately, CoinCannon offers everything online customers need to convert their assets. Thanks to a hassle-free KYC process and super-competitive exchange fees, you can instantly exchange Payeer USD to Tether USDT.

Get started! Head over to jolixo, select Payeer USD on the left box and Tether USDT on the right and you’re good to go.

What Do I Need to Exchange Payeer USD to Tether?

For this exchange direction, you will need a verified and active Payeer account. Make sure that the transaction amount does not exceed your withdrawal limit. In order to receive Tether (USDT), you will need a reliable crypto wallet. There are too many options out there, but CoinCannon suggests customers to use Trust Wallet. Furthermore, make sure you pay attention to the TRC20 and ERC20 variants for Tether as they use different networks for transactions and require different wallet addresses.

On the other hand, for CoinCannon platform, all you need is an email address. CoinCannon does not require KYC (know your customer) or sign up. However, there are benefits and rewards for those who sign up on CoinCannon. How do you like winning $100 gifts ever single month?

What is Payeer and How Does it Work?

First and foremost, Payeer is considered an online digital wallet for better asset management. Be it crypto of fiat, the payment processor is quick, reliable and cheap. In that regard, in a short lifespan of almost 8 years, Payeer is now recognized as one of the very best amongst competitors. Payeer utilizes built-in payment services with giant financial services such as Mastercard, VISA and PayPal.

As of 2021, the Payeer has approximately 7 million users which can transfer funds to each other with extremely low fees. The strength however, lies in diversity. Payeer is far ahead of any similar platform in terms of scale of operation and diversity in supported payment methods. With more than 50 payment approaches, the Payeer wallet offers users various services in one place.

To learn more about Payeer, continue reading “What is Payeer?”

Why Exchange Payeer USD to Tether USDT?

Tether is a cryptocurrency based on blockchain whose crypto coins in use are backed by an equivalent amount of traditional fiat currencies, such as the Dollar, Euro, or Japanese Yen that is retained in a specific bank account. The Tether tokens, the Tether network’s native tokens, trade under the USDT symbol.

In contrast to the wide swings observed in the prices of other popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and Ethereum, Tether belongs to a new race of cryptocurrencies called stablecoins that aims to keep cryptocurrency valuations stable. Instead of being used as a means of speculative investment, this would allow Tether to be used as a medium of exchange and a mode of storage of value.

Tether was specifically developed to create the necessary CoinCannon between fiat currencies and cryptocurrencies, providing users with stability, transparency, and minimum transaction fees. It is pegged against the US dollar and, in terms of value, maintains a 1-to-1 ratio with USD. There is, however, no guarantee provided by Tether Ltd. for any right to redeem or exchange real money for Tethers, i.e. Tethers cannot be exchanged for U.S. Dollars.

CoinCannon Platform

Say goodbye to the hassle of searching for the perfect online exchange. CoinCannon is here to offer you everything you need and more. With a combination of anonymity, unbeatable exchange rates, and reliability, it’s a platform like no other.

At CoinCannon, your privacy is our top priority. We understand the importance of keeping personal information safe, and that’s why we don’t require it from our customers. With no KYC or sign-up required, you can trade confidently and securely.

Looking for the best exchange rates? CoinCannon is right there for you. Our platform uses an automated system to ensure that you always get the best value for your trades. Don’t just take our word for it, visit ranking websites like BestChange and OkChanger and see for yourself.

We believe in being proactive and keeping ahead of any potential problems. That’s why we offer 24/7 customer support. No matter the issue, our team is always here to help. So go ahead, make your trades with peace of mind knowing that CoinCannon has got your back.

How to Exchange Payeer USD to Tether USDT

  1. Enter the Homepage on CoinCannon. Select Payeer on the left field and Tether USDT on the right one. Enter the exchange amount and wait for the rates to apply.
  2. Click on Exchange and you will be forwarded to the next step where you will need to enter your USDT wallet address, email, and phone number (optional).
  3. Click on “Exchange” one more time as you go to the next page to review your order.
  4. At this point, you will obtain your Tracking ID, an address and an explorer URL.
  5. On this step, please dedicate some time to review our terms and conditions and the instructions.
  6. By now, you will go to the Payeer gateway. Transfer your Payeer USD to the CoinCannon wallet address that is provided for you. Then, make sure to upload a screenshot of the payment.
  7. Finally, click on the “I’ve paid” button.

Done!

When you finish the steps above, our team will process your order and send the Tether to your wallet address. The transaction may take a few minutes. In the meantime, you will have a track id to follow up on your order. Simply enter the main page and type in your track id in the specified field to see your live order status. Keep in mind that your track id is private information and you should not share it with anyone else.

The post How to Exchange Payeer USD to Tether USDT appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: How to Buy IOTA with Payeer [Private and Secure]
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
You can directly buy IOTA with Payeer USD on CoinCannon if you have a Payeer account. The exchange will be fully private and backed by 24/7 customer support. IOTA has been around for a while but only recently the network experienced a massive growth in popularity. Having signed partnership contracts with companies like Volkswagen and […]

The post How to Buy IOTA with Payeer [Private and Secure] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
You can directly buy IOTA with Payeer USD on CoinCannon if you have a Payeer account. The exchange will be fully private and backed by 24/7 customer support. IOTA has been around for a while but only recently the network experienced a massive growth in popularity. Having signed partnership contracts with companies like Volkswagen and Bosch, IOTA platform is nothing short of extraordinary. Good news is that you can Buy and Sell MIOTA on CoinCannon with the best rates at any time.

What is IOTA?

To explain IOTA, we must first discuss distributed ledgers. A distributed ledger is simply a database that is shared by multiple participants like sites, servers, institutions etc. It is essentially a network within which the transactions can be witnessed and saved by all participants.

IOTA is a distributed ledger which executes and records the transactions between devices and computers in the internet of things (IoT) ecosystem. In simpler terms, it is a network that utilizes its own cryptocurrency called MIOTA for transactions.

In terms of utility, it benefits from a massively improved scalability and transaction speed. The platform has a system of nodes (proof of stake) for consensus called Tangle.

As of December 2021, MIOTA is currently ranked as the 47th cryptocurrency with a market cap of $3.2 billion.

Why Buy IOTA with Payeer?

First and foremost, Payeer is considered an online digital wallet for better asset management. Be it crypto of fiat, the payment processor is quick, reliable and cheap. In that regard, in a short lifespan of almost 8 years, Payeer is now recognized as one of the very best amongst competitors. Payeer utilizes built-in payment services with giant financial services such as Mastercard, VISA and PayPal.

As of 2021, the Payeer has approximately 7 million users which can transfer funds to each other with extremely low fees. The strength however, lies in diversity. Payeer is far ahead of any similar platform in terms of scale of operation and diversity in supported payment methods. With more than 50 payment approaches, the Payeer wallet offers users various services in one place.

To learn more about Payeer, continue reading “What is Payeer?”

Why Buy IOTA with Payeer on CoinCannon?

CoinCannon is an online exchange that offers everything you need from a platform.

Truthfully, it is a rare combination for an online exchange to offer anonymity, lowest exchange rates and unparalleled reliability altogether.

We respect our customer’s privacy by not asking for their personal information. The best way for anyone to protect their information is to not disclose them at all. In that regard, not having KYC or sign up is the best method.

Furthermore, the platform utilizes an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at all times. Our words sound too good? Just pay a visit to ranking websites such as BestChange and OkChanger and see for yourself.

Lastly, according to Murphy’s law “anything that can go wrong will go wrong”. To stay ahead of any problems, we offer 24/7 customer support.

Step-by-Step Guide

Select Payeer USD on the “I Give” field on the left and IOTA on the “I Get” field on the right.

Enter the desired amount for the exchange and wait for the site to calculate the amazing exchange rates!

Click “Exchange”

Enter your IOTA Wallet address and E-mail address

Click “Exchange”

Read the Information

Complete the CAPTCHA

Click “Exchange”

At this point, please check the transaction information and terms and conditions carefully.

You will be able to see the track id and CoinCannon Payeer account

Open your Payeer account, click on the account menu and copy the account number that begins by the letter “p” and paste it in the required field.

Go back to your Payeer account and send the exchange amount to CoinCannon Payeer account.

Once you have sent the exchange amount, go to the history menu on your Payeer account and copy the operation id for the payment. Then paste the operation id in the required field.

Kindly agree to the terms and conditions and click on “Pay Order.

Finished!

At this point, our sales team will immediately get to work and make the IOTA payment to your wallet. The process does not take long, however, you can spend some time reading articles on CoinCannon Blog. The blog has a wide variety of subjects from technical price analysis to satire pieces about the market.

The post How to Buy IOTA with Payeer [Private and Secure] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.content:encoded:
If you’re looking to know how to buy Polkadot with Perfect Money look no further as we will provide a full 2024 guide and the best platform to make the exchange.

DOT has been amongst the very best altcoins in the past two years. Utilizing a revolutionary idea as well as great leadership by Gavin Wood, the network is reaching new heights.

In this article, we will guide you on how to buy Polkadot with Perfect Money and to avoid sky-high exchange rates. Furthermore, you don’t have to share your personal information with the platform unlike big trading apps.

Get started right now, head over to jolixo to buy DOT.

Buy DOT with Perfect Money Right Now!

Why Buy Polkadot with Perfect Money?

Perfect Money is an e-currency used for making payments on the internet. It is widely accepted as payment option by countless platforms. With Perfect Money, you can do a lot! Be it transferring funds to others or pay for goods and services. Or how about buying cryptocurrencies or even buying fiat currencies. It is a seriously popular payment method for online users. An additional capability is to loan and receipt issuance throughout the system.

The biggest downside of Perfect Money, however, is that you cannot cash Perfect money to your bank account on its website directly. For that, you will need a platform like CoinCannon to exchange your Perfect Money to PayPal and other e-currencies.

How to Buy Polkadot with Perfect Money?

On top of that, all transactions will have 24/7 online support to ensure the utmost quality of service. Since the early days of crypto, Tether (USDT) has been so inevitably utilitarian that all of us have to use it. Basically, it is a stablecoin that we buy and sell to hedge against the market volatility. In this article, we will go over everything you need to buy Tether with Payeer USD on our platform.

What Do I Need to Buy Tether with Payeer?

For this exchange direction, you will need a verified and active Payeer account to make the payments. Plus, you will also need to have a secure crypto wallet that supports Tether (USDT). As for the CoinCannon, all you need is an email address since no KYC (know your customer) is mandatory. Having said that, there are many advantages for those who sign up on CoinCannon. By signing up, you will take part in our monthly airdrops with multiple $100 gifts!

What is Tether (USDT)?

Before reading about how to buy Tether USDT, let’s take a quick look at what Tether is and how it operates. Tether is a cryptocurrency based on blockchain whose crypto coins in use are backed by an equivalent amount of traditional fiat currencies, such as the Dollar, Euro, or Japanese Yen that is retained in a specific bank account. The Tether tokens, the Tether network’s native tokens, trade under the USDT symbol.

In contrast to the wide swings observed in the prices of other popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and Ethereum, Tether belongs to a new race of cryptocurrencies called stablecoins that aims to keep cryptocurrency valuations stable. Instead of being used as a means of speculative investment, this would allow Tether to be used as a medium of exchange and a mode of storage of value.

Tether was specifically developed to create the necessary CoinCannon between fiat currencies and cryptocurrencies, providing users with stability, transparency, and minimum transaction fees. It is pegged against the US dollar and, in terms of value, maintains a 1-to-1 ratio with USD. There is, however, no guarantee provided by Tether Ltd. for any right to redeem or exchange real money for Tethers, i.e. Tethers cannot be exchanged for U.S. Dollars.

Learn How to Exchange Tether to PayPal

Why Buy Tether with Payeer?

First and foremost, Payeer is considered an online digital wallet for better asset management. Be it crypto of fiat, the payment processor is quick, reliable and cheap. In that regard, in a short lifespan of almost 8 years, Payeer is now recognized as one of the very best amongst competitors. Payeer utilizes built-in payment services with giant financial services such as Mastercard, VISA and PayPal.

As of 2021, the Payeer has approximately 7 million users which can transfer funds to each other with extremely low fees. The strength however, lies in diversity. Payeer is far ahead of any similar platform in terms of scale of operation and diversity in supported payment methods. With more than 50 payment approaches, the Payeer wallet offers users various services in one place.

To learn more about Payeer, continue reading “What is Payeer?”.

CoinCannon Number One!

We respect our customer’s privacy by not asking for their personal information. The best way for anyone to protect their information is to not disclose them at all. In that regard, not having KYC or sign up is the best method.

Furthermore, the platform utilizes an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at all times. Our words sound too good? Just pay a visit to ranking websites such as BestChange and OkChanger and see for yourself.

Lastly, according to Murphy’s law “anything that can go wrong will go wrong”. To stay ahead of any problems, we offer 24/7 customer support.

How to Buy Tether with Payeer USD?

Step 1

  1. Select Payeer USD on the “I Give” field on the left and Tether (USDT) on the “I Get” field on the right.
  2. Enter the desired amount for the exchange and wait for the site to calculate the amazing exchange rates!

Step 3

Step 4

  2. You will be able to see the track id and CoinCannon Payeer account
  3. Open your Payeer account, click on the account menu and copy the account number that begins by the letter “p” and paste it in the required field.
  4. Go back to your Payeer account and send the exchange amount to CoinCannon Payeer account.
  5. Once you have sent the exchange amount, go to the history menu on your Payeer account and copy the operation id for the payment. Then paste the operation id in the required field.
  6. Kindly agree to the terms and conditions and click on “Pay Order.

Done!

When you finish the steps above, our team will process your order and send the USDT to your wallet address. The transaction may take a few minutes. In the meantime, you will have a track id to follow up on your order. Simply enter the main page and type in your track id in the specified field to see your live order status. Keep in mind that your track id is private information and you should not share it with anyone else.

item.content:encoded:
Here is the best platform to exchange TonCoin to PayPal with full anonymity and no added fees: jolixo. TonCoin (TON) is one of the newer altcoins, aiming to deliver quick and efficient transactions. Now, while their timing may be a bit late for the absolutely saturated competition, their success tells us a lot about their potential. In this article, we will go over what is TonCoin (TON) and tell you all about how to exchange TonCoin to PayPal. And that is on a platform that does not compromise on privacy or charge the customer any extra fees for their added benefits.

What is TonCoin (TON)?

TonCoin (TON) is a high-speed, secure, and scalable blockchain platform and cryptocurrency. It was created in 2018 by the Russian-based Telegram messenger team with the aim of delivering a fast, secure, and scalable infrastructure for decentralized applications. TonCoin utilizes a multi-blockchain architecture, sharding, and an innovative consensus algorithm called “Proof-of-Stake-Vote” to achieve high speed and scalability.

One of the key features of TonCoin is its high-speed transactions, with the ability to process millions of transactions per second. This makes it suitable for a wide range of use cases, from decentralized exchanges to micropayments and gaming. TonCoin also provides robust security features, including end-to-end encryption and multi-sig support.

Another advantage of TonCoin is its multi-blockchain architecture, which allows for greater scalability and allows for the creation of custom blockchain solutions for specific use cases. This allows developers to create highly optimized blockchain solutions that are tailored to their specific requirements.

TonCoin also offers a unique consensus algorithm, “Proof-of-Stake-Vote”, which combines the benefits of Proof-of-Stake and Delegated Proof-of-Stake. This consensus algorithm allows for fast and efficient consensus, while also providing a high degree of security. This consensus algorithm also enables TonCoin to have a more democratic governance structure, with token holders having the ability to vote on important network decisions.

In conclusion, TonCoin offers a highly scalable and secure blockchain platform, with a focus on high-speed transactions, multi-blockchain architecture, and a unique consensus algorithm. With its wide range of use cases, robust security features, and democratic governance structure, TonCoin has the potential to become a major player in the cryptocurrency and blockchain space.

Why Exchange TonCoin to PayPal?

PayPal is an online trade company that, through online transfers, facilitates payments between parties. Its system allows clients to set up an account on its platform that is linked to the user’s credit card or checking account. Upon confirmation of identification and proof of funds, through the website or application of the company, users can begin sending or receiving payments online to and from other PayPal accounts.

As mentioned above, in order to transfer money to others using the receiver’s email address or mobile phone number, PayPal account holders can use the website or mobile application of the company. Within only a matter of minutes, transactions go through and the company promises that transfers are immediately available for payment or withdrawal to a bank account.

The ease of use and the wide acceptance makes the exchange cryptocurrencies to PayPal one of the best options when you need some cash to spend online.

All that said, you also have the ability to exchange TonCoin (TON) to Perfect Money USD, Payeer USD or Webmoney USD.

CoinCannon is Better!

Say goodbye to the hassle of searching for the perfect online exchange. CoinCannon is here to offer you everything you need and more. With a combination of anonymity, unbeatable exchange rates, and reliability, it’s a platform like no other.

At CoinCannon, your privacy is our top priority. We understand the importance of keeping personal information safe, and that’s why we don’t require it from our customers. With no KYC or sign-up required, you can trade confidently and securely.

Looking for the best exchange rates? CoinCannon is right there for you. Our platform uses an automated system to ensure that you always get the best value for your trades. Don’t just take our word for it, visit ranking websites like BestChange and OkChanger and see for yourself.

We believe in being proactive and keeping ahead of any potential problems. That’s why we offer 24/7 customer support. No matter the issue, our team is always here to help. So go ahead, make your trades with peace of mind knowing that CoinCannon has got your back.

How to Exchange TonCoin to PayPal?

  1. Enter the Homepage on CoinCannon. Select TonCoin (TON) on the left field and PayPal on the right one. Enter the exchange amount and wait for the rates to apply.
  2. Click on Exchange and you will be forwarded to the next step where you will need to enter your PayPal account details, TON wallet address, email, and phone number (optional).
  3. Click on “Exchange” one more time as you go to the next page to review your order.
  4. At this point, you will obtain your Tracking ID, an address and an explorer URL.
  5. On this step, please dedicate some time to review our terms and conditions and the instructions.
  6. Transfer your TonCoin to the CoinCannon wallet address that is provided for you.
  7. Finally, click on the “I’ve paid” button.

Done!

After the steps mentioned above, our team will immediately process your order. Keep in mind that PayPal payments might take a while to complete. In the meantime, you can pay a visit to CoinCannon Blog and read some of the latest news articles about the crypto market. If you have any questions or problems, you can get in touch with the 24/7 online support section on the website.

What is Solana?

In short, Solana is a blockchain platform for decentralized applications (DApps). The network utilizes Proof of Stake consensus algorithm. However, in a world full of PoS blockchain networks, Solana has managed to achieve some impressive figures. The network can support up to 50,000 transactions per second (TPS) and requires 400 milliseconds to build a block. With the quickly increasing number of validators currently at 1,061, the network is one of the fastest out there.

SOL is currently the 4th cryptocurrency with an astonishing $67+ billion market cap. As of November 2021, Solana has had almost 10000% growth in one year.

item.content:encoded:
if you’re Looking to cash out your stablecoins, you can exchange DAI to PayPal on CoinCannon with the lowest exchange fees. DAI is the latest stablecoin added to CoinCannon platform along with, USDC and TUSD. Created with a unique architecture, DAI is a different kind of stable coin that offers better reliability compared with others. In this article, we will go through everything you need to exchange DAI to PayPal on CoinCannon website. You can also exchange DAI to other currencies on the platform.

What is DAI?

DAI is an Ethereum-based stablecoin. A stablecoin is a cryptocurrency with a pegged value to another currency. In case of DAI, it is pegged to the US dollar and much like Tether and USDC, Dai will always be worth $1. Stablecoins are a crucial part of the crypto market as they offer very little volatility. In that regard, investors use stablecoins to save their funds in the form of a reliable and stable asset.

What makes DAI unique is a clever design that eliminates the biggest concerns for stablecoins. Generally speaking, conventional stablecoins require a massive reserve by the company. For example, for every Tether USD, the Tether company must hold $1 USD in their reserve. This is a huge issue for companies as it is difficult to provide liquidity and keep it consistent.

DAI offers a new solution for this problem. By using an automated system of smart contracts on Ethereum blockchain, DAI does now need a reserve. Using collateralized debt denominated in ETH allows DAI to maintain the 1:1 ration with USD. Simply speaking, users can deposit Ethereum or other cryptocurrencies can borrow against the value of their deposit and generate new DAI. The currency is this case is known as collateral.

Currently, DAI has a market cap of over $9 billion and is ranked as 19th cryptocurrency.

Why Exchange DAI to PayPal?

PayPal is an online trade company that, through online transfers, facilitates payments between parties. Its system allows clients to set up an account on its platform that is linked to the user’s credit card or checking account. Upon confirmation of identification and proof of funds, through the website or application of the company, users can begin sending or receiving payments online to and from other PayPal accounts.

As mentioned above, in order to transfer money to others using the receiver’s email address or mobile phone number, PayPal account holders can use the website or mobile application of the company. Within only a matter of minutes, transactions go through and the company promises that transfers are immediately available for payment or withdrawal to a bank account.

The ease of use and the wide acceptance makes the exchange cryptocurrencies to PayPal one of the best options when you need some cash to spend online.

All that said, you also have the ability to exchange DAI to Perfect Money USD, Payeer USD or Webmoney USD.

Why CoinCannon?

CoinCannon is an online exchange that offers everything you need from a platform.

Truthfully, it is a rare combination for an online exchange to offer anonymity, lowest exchange rates and unparalleled reliability altogether.

We respect our customer’s privacy by not asking for their personal information. The best way for anyone to protect their information is to not disclose them at all. In that regard, not having KYC or sign up is the best method.

Furthermore, the platform utilizes an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at all times. Our words sound too good? Just pay a visit to ranking websites such as BestChange and OkChanger and see for yourself.

Lastly, according to Murphy’s law “anything that can go wrong will go wrong”. To stay ahead of any problems, we offer 24/7 customer support.

How to Exchange DAI to PayPal?

  1. Enter the Homepage on CoinCannon. Select DAI on the left field and PayPal on the right one. Enter the exchange amount and wait for the rates to apply.
  2. Click on Exchange and you will be forwarded to the next step where you will need to enter your PayPal account details, email, and phone number.
  3. Click on “Exchange” one more time as you go to the next page to review your order.
  4. At this point, you will obtain your Tracking ID, an address and an explorer URL.
  5. On this step, please dedicate some time to review our terms and conditions and the instructions.
  6. Transfer your DAI to the CoinCannon wallet address that is provided for you.
  7. Finally, click on the “I’ve paid” button.

Done!

At this point, our team will process the order and make the payment to your account. PayPal payments might take some time. We suggest you read some of the articles on CoinCannon Blog as you wait for the transaction.
